content: here is my necktie scarf i was looking through ravelry for days to find a crochet version and they were all knit and while i love knitting i knew the crochet stitches would give me the structure to stand on its own around my neck and the color details of this yarn could really pop idk sometimes i just prefer crochet yanno items needed 4 mm hook one skein 230 yds of dk weight yarn an afternoon or two <3
